item.title: Human-Object Interaction Detection Collaborated with Large Relation-driven Diffusion Models
item.description: DIFFUSIONHOI: A novel HOI detector using text-to-image diffusion models to improve compositional reasoning and handling of novel concepts, achieving state-of-the-art performance.
